author: Simon Difford
description: Original Savoy and Vermeire recipes for this cocktail specify 2 dashes of crème de noyeaux. I've interpreted this as being a generous 5ml / 1/6oz measure to add a delicate pink hue and a fruity almond note to this Dry Martini-style cocktail.
name: Fairbanks No.2

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
